resources.string: Press and hold on a brick to block it
Select the touch mode to use your finger. Swipe the screen to make the paddle move accordingly
Select the controller mode to use your controller.\nSwipe the screen to make the controller move accordingly
Select the dynamic mode to use the accelerometer.\nTilt the device to make the paddle move accordingly

During a journey into space, the mother ship \"Arkanoid\" is attacked and destroyed by a mysterious external force \\;\nThe small spaceship \"Vaus\" manages to escape, but is then trapped in a space-temporal fold.
Move the paddle at the bottom of the screen to keep the ball from falling, your goal is to destroy all the bricks without losing all the lives.

Collect the power-ups to make it easier to complete the level:
-Fireball = Destroys all bricks in its path until it touches the ceiling.
- Magnifier = Enlarges the paddle to be able to take the ball more easily.
- Slow motion = Slows down the ball to be able to handle it more easily.
- + 1 Life = adds a life to those currently in possession
